TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintTicket extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public NotInheritable Class PrintTicket Implements INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 定義列印工作的設定。

span.span: Defines the settings of a print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是簡單-到-工作-與表示，特定類型的 XML 文件稱為*PrintTicket 文件*。A object is an easy-to-work-with representation of a certain type of XML document called a *PrintTicket document*. 後者是一組的指示告訴印表機設定 （例如雙面列印、 自動分頁及裝訂） 及其各種功能的方式。The latter is a set of instructions telling a printer how to set its various features (such as duplexing, collating, and stapling). 例如，若要指示來開啟其裝訂器並裝訂在左上角的列印工作的印表機，文件必須``項目，指定**StapleTopLeft**。For example, to instruct the printer to turn on its stapler and staple print jobs in the upper left corner, the document would have a `` element that specifies **StapleTopLeft**. 項目，接著會由表示屬性物件。The element is, in turn, represented by the property of the object. PrintTicket 文件必須符合[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。The PrintTicket document must conform to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). 類別可讓您的應用程式設定印表機的功能，而不必牽扯 XML 的任何直接寫入物件。The class enables your application to configure the printer's features without having to engage in any direct writing of XML objects. 所有最受歡迎的家用以及商業檔案和相片的印表機功能都由屬性類別。All of the most popular features of home and business file and photo printers are represented by properties of the class. 但是[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)定義更多，較不常見，功能也可以擴充來處理特殊的列印裝置的功能。But the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) defines many more, less common, features and it can be extended to handle features of specialty printing devices. 因此，雖然和類別無法被繼承，您可以擴充[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)辨識不計算中的列印裝置功能或類別。So, although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 列印結構描述和建立新的列印系統類別擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). **請注意**時與接受 PrintTicket 文件的建構函式建立物件 (做為) 參數，該整份文件會儲存在非公用欄位中包含的 XML 項目，其中的物件，未表示的任何的公用屬性的一般功能較快速類別。**Note** When the object is created with the constructor that takes a PrintTicket document (as a ) parameter, that entire document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事實上，如果產生 PrintTicket 文件的驅動程式使用的私用擴充功能[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)，也未公開已定義標記也會儲存為非公用 PrintTicket 文件的一部分。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintTicket document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintTicket document. > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援為 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果您想要從 Windows Form 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何判斷特定印表機的功能以及如何設定使用這些列印工作。The following example shows how to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何合併兩個列印票證時使用這個建構函式。The following example shows how to use this constructor while merging two print tickets. [!code-csharp[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/CSharp/printticket.cs#usingmergeandvalidate)] [!code-vb[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/visualbasic/printticket.vb#usingmergeandvalidate)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream xmlStream) cil managed

param.name: xmlStream
param.span: 描述列印工作並且符合列印結構描述的 XML 資料流。

span.span: An XML stream that describes a print job and conforms to the Print Schema.

summary.span: 使用符合 XML [列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 資料流 (包含 PrintTicket 文件)，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an XML stream (that contains a PrintTicket document) that complies with the XML [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不會重回其原始位置的資料流的讀取寫入位置。The constructor does not reset the read-write position of the stream back to its original position. 因此，您應該在呼叫建構函式之後立即重設它。Accordingly, you should reset it immediately after calling the constructor. 整個 PrintTicket 文件儲存在非公用欄位中包含的 XML 元素，表示未表示的任何的公用屬性的較不常見功能的物件類別。The entire PrintTicket document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事實上，如果產生 PrintTicket 文件的驅動程式使用的私用擴充功能[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)，也未公開已定義標記也會儲存為非公用 PrintTicket 文件的一部分。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintTicket document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintTicket document. 私用組件的文件中，如果有的話，不會驗證建構函式，但所有**列印結構描述**-已定義的組件進行驗證，包括未表示的任何公用屬性的組件類別。The private parts of the document, if any, are not validated by the constructor, but all **Print Schema**-defined parts are validated, including the parts that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 因此，可能擲回，即使所有的公用屬性對應的 XML 標記無效。Accordingly, the could be thrown even if all of the XML markup that corresponds to the public properties is valid. 當任何屬性的寫入，也會變更這個非公用 PrintTicket 文件。When any of the properties of the are written to, this non-public PrintTicket document is changed as well. 這是傳回的這個非公用 PrintTicket 文件和方法。It is this non-public PrintTicket document that is returned by the and methods.

exception.span: 為 。

exception.span: 不是有效的 XML。

span.span: is not valid XML.

summary.span: 建立這個 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Collation As Nullable(Of Collation)
public: property Nullable<System::Printing::Collation> Collation { Nullable<System::Printing::Collation> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::Collation> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出印表機是否要將輸出自動分頁。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printer collates its output.

value.span: 值，指出印表機是否要將輸出自動分頁。

span.span: A value indicating whether the printer collates its output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`DocumentCollate`關鍵字不`JobCollateAllDocuments`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `DocumentCollate` keyword, not the `JobCollateAllDocuments` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性，當測試印表機的功能和設定使用這些列印工作。The following example shows how to use this property when testing a printer's capabilities and configuring a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property CopyCount As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> CopyCount { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定列印工作的份數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of copies for the print job.

value.span: 可為 null 的 值，指定要列印幾份複本。

span.span: A nullable value that specifies how many copies to print.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobCopiesAllDocuments`關鍵字不`DocumentCopiesAllPages`關鍵字，或`PageCopies`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobCopiesAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentCopiesAllPages` keyword, or the `PageCopies` keyword. 您可以測試使用印表機的最大屬性。You can test for the printer's maximum by using the property.

exception.span: 呼叫程式碼嘗試將屬性設定為小於 1 的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value less than 1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property DeviceFontSubstitution As Nullable(Of DeviceFontSubstitution)

public: property Nullable<System::Printing::DeviceFontSubstitution> DeviceFontSubstitution { Nullable<System::Printing::DeviceFontSubstitution> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::DeviceFontSubstitution> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出對於這個列印工作，印表機是否會將以裝置內建的字型替換為電腦上的字型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printer substitutes device-based fonts for computer-based fonts on the print job.

value.span: 值，指出對於目前的列印工作，印表機是否會將以裝置為基礎的字型替換為以電腦為基礎的字型。

span.span: A value indicating whether the device substitutes device-based fonts for computer-based fonts for the current print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageDeviceFontSubstitution`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageDeviceFontSubstitution` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

exception.span: 呼叫程式碼嘗試將屬性設定為不屬於 列舉的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the enumeration.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating what kind of two-sided printing, if any, the printer uses for the print job.

value.span: 值，指出印表機要使用哪一種雙面列印 (如果有的話) 來執行這個列印工作。

span.span: A value indicating what sort of two-sided printing, if any, the printer uses for the print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously`關鍵字不`DocumentDuplex`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentDuplex` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性合併兩個列印票證。The following example shows how to use this property while merging two print tickets. [!code-csharp[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/CSharp/printticket.cs#usingmergeandvalidate)] [!code-vb[PrintTicketManagment#UsingMergeAndValidate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintTicketManagment/visualbasic/printticket.vb#usingmergeandvalidate)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.MemoryStream GetXmlStream() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回 物件，以將 的屬性值表示為符合[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 資料流。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the property values of a as an XML stream that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

returns.span: 物件，其會使用符合[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 來描述列印票證。

span.span: A object that describes the print ticket with XML that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何屬性的是`null`，它們將只是不會包含在 XML 標記。If any properties of the are `null`, they will simply not be included in the XML markup. 如果物件 PrintTicket 文件，其中包含標記項目不代表任何以建構類別的公用屬性，這些項目將會包含在這個方法所傳回的 PrintTicket 文件。If the object was constructed with a PrintTicket document that contains markup elements not represented by any of the class's public properties, those elements will be included in the PrintTicket document returned by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property InputBin As Nullable(Of InputBin)
public: property Nullable<System::Printing::InputBin> InputBin { Nullable<System::Printing::InputBin> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::InputBin> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出要使用哪一個輸入紙匣 (紙匣)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating what input bin (paper tray) to use.

value.span: 值，指出要使用哪一個輸入紙匣，以及要手動或自動選擇。

span.span: An value indicating what input tray is used and whether it is chosen manually or automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 也就是說，會有任何標記[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的功能`JobInputBin`， `DocumentInputBin`，或`PageInputBin`。That is, there will be no markup for the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s features `JobInputBin`, `DocumentInputBin`, or `PageInputBin`. 當這個屬性不`null`，它將具有下列關聯性中定義的功能[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。When this property is not `null`, it will have the following relationships to the features defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). - 如果 XML 形式的包含`JobInputBin`，則這個屬性與相同的值`JobInputBin`(不論是否有也是`DocumentInputBin`或`PageInputBin`。If the XML form of the contains `JobInputBin`, then this property has the same value as `JobInputBin` (regardless of whether or not there is also `DocumentInputBin` or `PageInputBin`. 標記中的 XML 版本)。markup in the XML version of the ). - 如果沒有任何`JobInputBin`標記，但是沒有`DocumentInputBin`，則這個屬性與相同的值`DocumentInputBin`(不論是否有也是`PageInputBin`標記) 存在。If there is no `JobInputBin` markup, but there is `DocumentInputBin`, then this property has the same value as `DocumentInputBin` (regardless of whether or not there is also `PageInputBin` markup) present. - 如果有既不是`JobInputBin`也`DocumentInputBin`標記，但是沒有`PageInputBin`標記，則這個屬性具有相同的值做為`PageInputBin`。If there is neither `JobInputBin` nor `DocumentInputBin` markup, but there is `PageInputBin` markup, then this property has the same value as `PageInputBin`. 當這個屬性設定為任何值，然後比對`JobInputBin`標記將會加入至 XML 的 print ticket 和任何`DocumentInputBin`和`PageInputBin`已經存在的標記將會移除。When this property is set to any value, then matching `JobInputBin` markup will be added to the XML print ticket and any `DocumentInputBin` and `PageInputBin` markup that is already there will be removed. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

value.span: 值，指出印表機如何處理有色彩或灰階的內容。

span.span: An value indicating how the printer handles content that has color or shades of gray.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOutputColor`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOutputColor` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性來設定列印工作。The following example shows how to use this property to configure a print job. [!code-csharp[XpsPrint#OutputColorAndPageOrientation](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/CSharp/XpsPrintHelper.cs#outputcolorandpageorientation)] [!code-vb[XpsPrint#OutputColorAndPageOrientation](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/visualbasic/xpsprinthelper.vb#outputcolorandpageorientation)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property OutputQuality As Nullable(Of OutputQuality)
public: property Nullable<System::Printing::OutputQuality> OutputQuality { Nullable<System::Printing::OutputQuality> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::OutputQuality> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出列印工作的輸出品質。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the quality of output for the print job.

value.span: 值，指定需要的品質等級。

span.span: An value that specifies the needed level of quality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOutputQuality`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOutputQuality` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定裝置列印內容是否要填滿到媒體的邊緣，或是在四周邊界留一點空間不要列印。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the device prints content to the edge of the media or leaves an unprinted margin around the edge.

value.span: 值，指定印表機是否使用無邊列印。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the printer uses borderless printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageBorderless`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageBorderless` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定印表機用於列印工作的紙張 (或其他媒體) 列印大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the page size for the paper (or other media) that a printer uses for a print job.

value.span: 物件，使用名稱、維度或兩者來代表頁面大小。

span.span: A object that represents the page size by using a name, dimensions, or both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageMediaSize`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageMediaSize` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性來調整以符合它為列印在紙張的邊界內的視覺項目。The following example shows how to use this property to scale a visual element to fit within the margins of the paper on which it is to print. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出印表機在列印多張頁面時，是要由後至前或是由前至後。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the printer prints multiple pages back-to-front or front-to-back.

value.span: 值，指出先印最後一頁或是先印第一頁。

span.span: A value specifying last-page-first printing or first-page-first printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobPageOrder`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobPageOrder` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出頁面內容的列印方向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how the page content is oriented for printing.

value.span: 值，指出頁面內容的列印方向，例如 或 。

span.span: A value specifying how page content is oriented, for example, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOrientation`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOrientation` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性來設定列印工作。The following example shows how to use this property to configure a print job. [!code-csharp[XpsPrint#OutputColorAndPageOrientation](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/CSharp/XpsPrintHelper.cs#outputcolorandpageorientation)] [!code-vb[XpsPrint#OutputColorAndPageOrientation](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/visualbasic/xpsprinthelper.vb#outputcolorandpageorientation)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Printing::PageResolution ^ PageResolution { System::Printing::PageResolution ^ get(); void set(System::Printing::PageResolution ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定印表機用於列印工作的頁面解析度等級。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of page resolution that the printer uses for a print job.

value.span: 值，以質化值、Dot Per Inch (DPI) 值或兩者都有的方式來表示解析度。

span.span: A value that represents the resolution as a qualitative value, a dots-per-inch value, or both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別具有您可以在其中指定點每英吋的 X 和 Y 維度的屬性和屬性可以讓解析度質化運算式。The class has properties in which you can specify the dots-per-inch for the X and Y dimensions and a property where you can give a qualitative expression to the resolution. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageResolution`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageResolution` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PageScalingFactor As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> PageScalingFactor { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定印表機放大或縮小頁面上列印影像的百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the percentage by which the printer enlarges or reduces the print image on a page.
An value that represents a percentage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 印表機可以有最大和最小縮放比例的限制。The printer can have maximum and minimum limits for scaling. 您可以使用測試的規模限制。You can test for scale limits by using . A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這屬性通常表示**標尺**`ScoredProperty`的[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageScaling`關鍵字。This property generally represents the **Scale** `ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageScaling` keyword. 但有一些變得複雜，如下所示。But there are some complexities as follows. 讀取時屬性，屬性的行為，如下所示。When reading the property, the property behaves as follows. - 如果 PrintTicket XML 文件有`PageScaling`功能設定為**CustomSquare**選項，而**CustomSquare**選項的**標尺**值為正數，然後，這是傳回的值。If the PrintTicket XML document has the `PageScaling` feature set to the **CustomSquare** option, and the **CustomSquare** option’s **Scale** value is positive value, then that is the value that is returned. - 如果 PrintTicket XML 文件有`PageScaling`功能設定為**自訂**選項，而**自訂**選項的**ScaleWidth**值為正值，則，傳回的值。If the PrintTicket XML document has the `PageScaling` feature set to the **Custom** option, and the **Custom** option’s **ScaleWidth** value is positive value, then that is the value that is returned. - 在其他情況下，`null`傳回。In all other cases, `null` is returned. 設定時屬性，屬性的行為，如下所示。When setting the property, the property behaves as follows. - 如果設定為`null`，然後在`PageScaling`標記移除了 PrintTicket XML 文件。If it’s set to `null`, then the `PageScaling` markup is removed from the PrintTicket XML document. - 否則， `PageScaling` PrintTicket XML 文件中的功能設定為**CustomSquare**和**CustomSquare**選項的**標尺**設定值來傳遞值。Otherwise, the `PageScaling` feature in the PrintTicket XML document is set to **CustomSquare** and the **CustomSquare** option’s **Scale** value is set to the passed value. (請參閱**例外狀況**如如果屬性設定為小於 1 的值，會發生什麼事。)(See **Exceptions** for what happens if the property is set to a value less than 1.)

exception.span: 呼叫程式碼嘗試將屬性設定為小於 1 的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is less than 1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PagesPerSheet As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> PagesPerSheet { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在一張紙的每一個面上列印的頁數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of pages that print on each printed side of a sheet of paper.

value.span: 可為 null 的 值，表示在一張紙的每一面上列印的頁數。

span.span: A nullable value that represents the number of pages that print on each printed side of a sheet of paper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分的印表機支援特定的可能性，例如 1、 2、 4、 6、 8 和 16 個端頁面有限的範圍。Most printers support only a limited range of specific possibilities, such as 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, and 16 pages per side. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至**PagesPerSheet** `ScoredProperty`的[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`關鍵字不`DocumentNUp`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the **PagesPerSheet**`ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

exception.span: 呼叫程式碼嘗試將屬性設定為小於 1 的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is less than 1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PagesPerSheetDirection As Nullable(Of PagesPerSheetDirection)

public: property Nullable<System::Printing::PagesPerSheetDirection> PagesPerSheetDirection { Nullable<System::Printing::PagesPerSheetDirection> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::PagesPerSheetDirection> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出印表機在單張紙正反面列印多頁的安排方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how a printer arranges multiple pages that print on each side of a sheet of paper.

value.span: 值，指出印表機在每張紙上如何呈現多頁。

span.span: A value indicating how a printer presents multiple pages per sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，印表機可將頁面左到右的資料列與資料列堆疊頂端向。For example, a printer can present pages in left-to-right rows with rows stacked top-to-bottom. A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至**PresentationDirection** subfeature 的[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`關鍵字不`DocumentNUp`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the **PresentationDirection** subfeature of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

exception.span: 呼叫程式碼嘗試將屬性設定為不屬於 列舉的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PhotoPrintingIntent As Nullable(Of PhotoPrintingIntent)

public: property Nullable<System::Printing::PhotoPrintingIntent> PhotoPrintingIntent { Nullable<System::Printing::PhotoPrintingIntent> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::PhotoPrintingIntent> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，以質化方式指出印表機用來列印相片的品質等級。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating in qualitative terms the level of quality the printer uses to print a photograph.
A value indicating the level of photo quality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相片的印表機驅動程式會將轉譯解析度和其他因素的特定量化值質化運算式在這個屬性中。The photographic printer driver translates the qualitative expression in this property into specific quantitative values for resolution and other factors. A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PagePhotoPrintingIntent`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PagePhotoPrintingIntent` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

exception.span: 呼叫程式碼嘗試將屬性設定為不屬於 列舉的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SaveTo(class System.IO.Stream outStream) cil managed

span.span: The that holds the saved .

summary.span: 使用符合[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 格式，將 設定儲存至 物件。

span.span: Saves the settings to a object by using an XML format that conforms to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會重回其原始位置的資料流的讀取寫入位置。This method does not reset the read-write position of the stream back to its original position. 您應該重設之後立即呼叫這個方法。You should reset it immediately after calling this method. 如果任何屬性的是`null`，它們將只是不會包含在 XML 標記。If any properties of the are `null`, they will simply not be included in the XML markup. 如果物件 PrintTicket 文件，其中包含標記項目不代表任何以建構類別的公用屬性，這些項目將會包含在這個方法所儲存的 PrintTicket 文件。If the object was constructed with a PrintTicket document that contains markup elements not represented by any of the class's public properties, those elements will be included in the PrintTicket document saved by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Stapling As Nullable(Of Stapling)
public: property Nullable<System::Printing::Stapling> Stapling { Nullable<System::Printing::Stapling> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::Stapling> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出印表機是否要裝訂多頁，以及釘書針要打在哪裡。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether, and where, a printer staples multiple pages.

value.span: 值，指定印表機如何裝訂輸出。

span.span: A value specifying how a printer staples the output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，印表機可以置於兩個裝訂的紙張或一個裝訂在左上角中的工作表的左邊緣。For example, a printer can place two staples on the left edge of a sheet of paper, or one staple in the upper left corner. A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobStapleAllDocuments`關鍵字不`DocumentStaple`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobStapleAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentStaple` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性，當測試印表機的功能和設定使用這些列印工作。The following example shows how to use this property when testing a printer's capabilities and configuring a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

exception.span: 呼叫程式碼嘗試將屬性設定為不屬於 列舉的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property TrueTypeFontMode As Nullable(Of TrueTypeFontMode)
public: property Nullable<System::Printing::TrueTypeFontMode> TrueTypeFontMode { Nullable<System::Printing::TrueTypeFontMode> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Printing::TrueTypeFontMode> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出印表機如何處理使用 TrueType 字型的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how the printer handles text that uses TrueType fonts.

value.span: 值，指定印表機如何處理 TrueType 字型。

span.span: A value specifying how a printer handles TrueType fonts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`null`這個屬性表示這個功能設定為未指定的值。A `null` value for this property means that this feature setting is not specified. 此外，當此值是`null`的 XML 版本(請參閱和) 將不會包含任何標記，這項功能。Also, when the value is `null`, the XML versions of the (see and ) will not contain any markup for this feature. 這個屬性會對應至[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageTrueTypeFontMode`關鍵字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageTrueTypeFontMode` keyword. 您可以測試使用的印表機支援的選項屬性。You can test for the options that the printer supports by using the property.

exception.span: 呼叫程式碼嘗試將屬性設定為不屬於 列舉的值。

span.span: Calling code has attempted to set the property to a value that is not in the enumeration.
